document_data.name: The Cave
document_data.mainbody: '''The Cave''' was a small asteroid in the [[Tears of Selûne]]. It was the lair and base of the ''[[Batship]]''.
document_data.Geography: The Cave was located near the center of the cluster. The entire surface of the asteroid was covered in a grass-like vegetation. In the underside of the rock there was a large cavern that served as a docking port for the ''Batship'', as well as a base where plunder collected by the ship's crew was stored before being sold.
document_data.Defenses: The ''Batship'' would promptly jump to protect its lair and prevent it from being located.
